code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import"./App.css";import Boxers from"./components/Boxers";import Header from"./components/Header";import Tools from"./components/Tools";import AddBoxer from"./components/AddBoxer";import{closeNewBoxer,selectAddBoxer}from"./features/addBoxerSlice";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import ViewBoxer from"./components/ViewBoxer";import{deselectViewBoxer,selectToViewBoxer}from"./features/selectBoxerSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){var addNewBoxerOpen=useSelector(selectAddBoxer);var selectToViewBoxerOpen=useSelector(selectToViewBoxer);var dispatch=useDispatch();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app__home",style:{opacity:addNewBoxerOpen&&"0.2"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app__body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tools,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Boxers,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddBoxer,{backdrop:"static",show:addNewBoxerOpen,onHide:function onHide(){return dispatch(closeNewBoxer());}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ViewBoxer,{show:selectToViewBoxerOpen,onHide:function onHide(){return dispatch(deselectViewBoxer());}})]});}export default App;
